info.title: Edge FOS REST API
info.description: Backend API for Edge FOS Mobile and Edge FOS Web (Dock Manager).

get.description:
Pre-condition:

A valid sicCode, shiftCode and planDate must be provided.
Post-conditions:

If successful, then a list of drivers are returned.
Otherwise an appropriate error message is returned.

A list of Drivers that have been successfully updated is returned.

put.summary: This operation updates only the availability status for driver schedule
put.description:
Pre-condition:

A valid employeeCode and statusCd must be provided.
Post-conditions:

If successful, then the employee schedule is updated.
Otherwise an appropriate error message is returned.

A list of Drivers that have been successfully updated is returned.

schema.description: List of DriverRosterEntry with employee code

post.summary: This operation adds a list drivers to the roster
post.description:
Pre-condition:

A list of drivers with valid employeeCode and valid siteCode, planDate, and shiftCode must be provided.
Post-conditions:

If successful, then the driver is added to the roster.
A list of Drivers that have been successfully added is returned.

schema.description: List of DriverRosterEntry with employee code

put.summary: Updates a conversation log entry of an employee
put.description:
This operation updates a conversation log entry of an employee.
              
Pre-condition:
1. Body's conversationLogEntry.employeeCode must match path variable employeeCode.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, updates the conversation log entry.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

post.summary: Performs an action for a specific door trailer.
post.description:
This operation performs an action for a specific door trailer.
              
Pre-condition:
1. Action parameters were submitted for the specified action.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, OK.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: doorNumber
parameters.description: The number assigned to the door.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

post.summary: Performs an action for a specific door.
post.description:
This operation performs an action for a specific door.
              
Pre-condition:
1. Action parameters were submitted for the specified action.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, OK.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: doorNumber
parameters.description: The number of the door from which the action originates.

parameters.name: actionCode
parameters.description: The code identifying the action to be performed.

parameters.name: doorPlanCode
parameters.description: The identifier for the door plan.

parameters.name: toDoorNumber
parameters.description: The number of the door which the action targets, if any.

parameters.name: doorStatusCode
parameters.description: The new status code for the door which originates the action, if any.

parameters.name: moveToSicCode
parameters.description: The code of the SIC to move to for the linehaul lane, if any.

parameters.name: closeToSicCode
parameters.description: The code of the SIC to move to for the linehaul lane, if any.

parameters.name: destinationToSicCode
parameters.description: The code of the SIC to move to for the linehaul lane, if any.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

get.summary: Gets the conversation log entries of an employee
get.description:
This operation retrieves the conversation log entries of an employee.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns the conversation log entries.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

post.summary: Saves a conversation log entry of an employee
post.description:
This operation saves a conversation log entry of an employee.
              
Pre-condition:
1. Body's conversationLogEntry.employeeCode must match path variable employeeCode.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, saves the conversation log entry.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

post.summary: Saves the conversation log entry attachment
post.description:
This operation saves the conversation log entry attachment.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, saves the conversation log entry attachment.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

get.description:
This operation retrieves a paginated result for a trailer search.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a paginated result of trailers is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

get.summary: Gets the trailer statuses, optionally filtering them by a current status code
get.description:
This operation retrieves a list of trailer statuses. If no current status code is provided,
the list will include all trailer statuses. If a trailer status code is provided,
the list will only include possible trailer statuses which could be assigned to a trailer on the current status.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a list of trailer statuses centers is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

get.summary: Gets a list of shipments that are loaded on the trailer.
get.description:
This operation returns a list of shipment.

Pre-conditions:
1. A valid offset and limit must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, the route details including the trailer information are returned.
3. Otherwise an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation returns shipment information at the dock.

Pre-conditions:
1. A valid PRO number must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, the shipment details are returned.
2. If a Shipment doesn't exist for the input parameters provided, then a 404 - Not Found status code is returned.
3. Otherwise an appropriate error message is returned.

get.summary: Gets the child PROs that are loaded.
get.description:
This operation returns the child PROs in a shipment.

Pre-conditions:
1. A valid PRO number must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, a child PRO list is returned.
2. Otherwise an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation returns child PRO information of the shipment.

Pre-conditions:
1. A valid PRO number and child PRO number must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, the child pro details are returned.
2. If a ChildPro doesn't exist for the input parameters provided, then a 404 - Not Found status code is returned.
3. Otherwise an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation retrieves a list of all operational service centers.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a list of all operational service centers is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation retrieves a list of reports based on the provided filters.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns a list reports.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.
This operation retrieves the list of the attendance departments

get.summary: Gets a service center by its identifier
get.description:
This operation retrieves a service center by its identifier.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns the service center.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation retrieves the door plan of a service center for a specific plan of a shift.
              
Pre-condition:
1. A valid sicCode, shiftCode, and doorPlanProfileCode must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a OperationSummary is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

get.summary: Get a list of door summaries available for a specific action.
get.description:
This operation retrieves a list of door summaries.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a list of door summaries is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: availableTargetForAction
parameters.description: The action for which the door should be available as target.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

get.summary: Gets the summary for a door at the dock.
get.description:
This operation retrieves the summary for a door at the dock.
              
Pre-condition:
1. A valid sicCode, shiftCode, doorPlanProfileCode and doorNumber must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a DoorSummary is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: doorNumber
parameters.description: The number assigned to the door.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

get.description:
This operation returns information about the trailer and the associated route along with the list of shipments that are loaded onto that trailer.

Pre-condition:
1. A valid sicCode, shiftCode, doorPlanProfileCode, and doorNumber must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then the trailer information and list of shipments along with the associated route are returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: doorNumber
parameters.description: The number assigned to the door.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

get.description:
This operation returns information about the route and associated trailer.

Pre-conditions:
1. A valid sicCode, shiftCode, doorPlanProfileCode, and doorNumber must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, the route details including the trailer information are returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: doorNumber
parameters.description: The number assigned to the door.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

get.summary: Gets Door Plan details by door number
get.description:
This operation retrieves the door plan based on the door number provided.
              
Pre-condition:
1. A valid sicCode, shiftCode, doorPlanProfileCode and doorNumber must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a DoorDetail is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: doorNumber
parameters.description: The number assigned to the door.

parameters.name: doorPlanProfileCode
parameters.description: The code uniquely identifying the door plan profile.

get.summary: Gets the scan type codes, optionally filtering them by an actual scanned code
get.description:
This operation retrieves the scan type codes, optionally filtered to only those for an actual scanned
code.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then the scan type codes.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

get.summary: Gets the user profile for Auth XPO
get.description:
This operation retrieves the user's profile center.

The clientId is not used, but it is the convention used by Auth XPO.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns the user profile.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation retrieves a list of employees based on the provided filters.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns a list employees.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation retrieves an employee based on the employee identifier.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns the employee.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

get.summary: Gets the attachment of a conversation log entry
get.description:
This operation retrieves the attachments for a conversation log entry.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns the attachment of a conversation log entry.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: conversationLogEntryAttachmentCode
parameters.description: The conversation entry log attachment identifier

delete.summary: Deletes the attachment of a conversation log entry
delete.description:
This operation deletes the attachments for a conversation log entry.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, deletes the attachment of a conversation log entry.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

parameters.name: conversationLogEntryAttachmentCode
parameters.description: The conversation entry log attachment identifier

get.description:
This operation retrieves a list of all door statuses.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a list of all door statuses is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation returns the available door plan profiles.

Pre-conditions:
1. A valid sicCode and shiftCode must be provided.

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a list of door plan profiles is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation retrieves a list of all conversation outcomes.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a list of all conversation outcomes is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

get.summary: Gets a conversation outcome by its identifier
get.description:
This operation retrieves a conversation outcome by its identifier.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns the conversation outcome.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

This operation retrieves a list of all conversation categories.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, then a list of all conversation categories is returned.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

get.summary: Gets a conversation category by its identifier
get.description:
This operation retrieves a conversation category by its identifier.
              
Pre-condition:
1. None

Post-conditions:
1. If successful, returns the conversation category.
2. Otherwise, an appropriate error message is returned.

DriverRosterEntry.description: The details for a driver roster entry.

ListDriverRosterEntryRequestResult.description: Lists driver roster entry request results.

ConversationLogEntry.description: The log entry about a conversation between a supervisor and an employee.

conversationLogEntryAttachmentCode.description: The code that uniquely identifies the conversation log entry attachment.

order.description: The order of the conversation log entry attachment relative to other ones, for listing.

ConversationLogEntryAttachmentMetadata.description: The metadata of an attachment for a log entry about a conversation between a supervisor and an employee.

PaginationDetails.description: Pagination details for the pagination envelope.

PaginationEnvelopeLinks.description: Pagination links for the pagination envelope.

ListTrailerStatusesResponse.description: Response to the request to list trailer statuses.

TrailerStatus.description: The details for a trailer status.

ChildPro.description: Child PRO number identifies a handling unit of a shipment.

ListAllServiceCentersResponse.description: Response to the request to list all service centers.

ServiceCenter.description: The details for a service center.

ListAllAttendanceDepartmentsResponse.description: Response to the request to list all attendance departments.

DoorPlan.description: The operation summary for a SIC.

DoorSummary.description: The summary information for a door.

ListDoorSummariesResponse.description: Response to the request to list door summaries.

ShipmentSummary.description: Shipment summary that are on the trailer.

TrailerManifest.description: Information about the trailer, the associated route and the list of shipments that are loaded.

DoorPndRoute.description: Information about route for the shipments.

RouteStop.description: Information about route for the shipments.

LaneNode.description: Lane nodes representing the trailer route.

LaneSummary.description: Detailed lane information for a trailer.

ListScanTypeCodesResponse.description: Response to the request to list scan type codes.

UserProfile.description: The details for a user profile.

DoorStatus.description: The details for a door status.

ListAllDoorStatusesResponse.description: Response to the request to list door statuses.

ListDoorPlanProfilesResponse.description: Response to the request to list door plan profiles.

ConversationOutcome.description: The possible outcome for conversations between a supervisor and an employee.

ListAllConversationOutcomesResponse.description: Response to the request to list all conversation outcomes.

conversationCategoryCode.description: The code that uniquely identifies the category of conversations between a supervisor and an employee.

name.description: The name of the category of conversations between a supervisor and an employee.

description.description: The description of the category of conversations between a supervisor and an employee.

order.description: The order of this conversation category relative to other categories, for listing.

ConversationCategory.description: The category for conversations between a supervisor and an employee.

ListAllConversationCategoriesResponse.description: Response to the request to list all conversation categories.
